McIvor mouth gag.context: The McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and the tongue depressor applied.

Tongue depressor.context: The McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and the tongue depressor applied.

Red rubber Robinson catheters.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

Laryngeal mirror.context: The nasopharynx was inspected with the laryngeal mirror.

Curettes.context: Serial passages of the curettes were utilized to remove the nasopharyngeal tissue, following which the nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% Neo-Synephrine and tannic acid powder.

Neo-Synephrine.context: Serial passages of the curettes were utilized to remove the nasopharyngeal tissue, following which the nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% Neo-Synephrine and tannic acid powder.

Tannic acid powder.context: Serial passages of the curettes were utilized to remove the nasopharyngeal tissue, following which the nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% Neo-Synephrine and tannic acid powder.

Suction Bovie unit.context: The McIvor was reopened, packs removed, and the bleeding was controlled with the suction Bovie unit.

Bleeding.context: The McIvor was reopened, packs removed, and the bleeding was controlled with the suction Bovie unit.
